original_text: You will soon go into the land that the Lord your God is giving to you. It will belong to you as your home.
korean_text: 네 하나님 여호와께서 네게 기업으로 주어 차지하게 하실 땅에 네가 들어가서 거기에 거주할 때에

sentences.original_text: You will soon go into the land
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 곧 그 땅으로 들어갈 것이요

sentences.original_text: that the Lord your God is giving to you
